description: A synchronous operation that allows you to submit a query with parameters to be stored by Timestream for later running. Timestream only supports using this operation with ValidateOnly set to true.

parameters.name: QueryString
parameters.description: The Timestream query string that you want to use as a prepared statement. Parameter names can be specified in the query string @ character followed by an identifier.

nested_items.name: QueryString
nested_items.description: The query string that you want prepare.

nested_items.name: Columns
nested_items.description: A list of SELECT clause columns of the submitted query string.

nested_items.name: Name
nested_items.description: Name of the column.

nested_items.name: ScalarType
nested_items.description: Indicates if the column is of type string, integer, Boolean, double, timestamp, date, time. For more information, see Supported data types.

nested_items.name: ArrayColumnInfo
nested_items.description: Indicates if the column is an array.

nested_items.name: Name
nested_items.description: The name of the result set column. The name of the result set is available for columns of all data types except for arrays.

nested_items.name: TimeSeriesMeasureValueColumnInfo
nested_items.description: Indicates if the column is a timeseries data type.

nested_items.name: Name
nested_items.description: The name of the result set column. The name of the result set is available for columns of all data types except for arrays.

nested_items.name: RowColumnInfo
nested_items.description: Indicates if the column is a row.

nested_items.name: Name
nested_items.description: The name of the result set column. The name of the result set is available for columns of all data types except for arrays.

nested_items.name: DatabaseName
nested_items.description: Database that has this column.

nested_items.name: TableName
nested_items.description: Table within the database that has this column.

nested_items.name: Aliased
nested_items.description: True, if the column name was aliased by the query. False otherwise.

nested_items.name: Parameters
nested_items.description: A list of parameters used in the submitted query string.

nested_items.name: Name
nested_items.description: Parameter name.

nested_items.name: ScalarType
nested_items.description: Indicates if the column is of type string, integer, Boolean, double, timestamp, date, time. For more information, see Supported data types.

nested_items.name: ArrayColumnInfo
nested_items.description: Indicates if the column is an array.

nested_items.name: Name
nested_items.description: The name of the result set column. The name of the result set is available for columns of all data types except for arrays.

nested_items.name: TimeSeriesMeasureValueColumnInfo
nested_items.description: Indicates if the column is a timeseries data type.

nested_items.name: Name
nested_items.description: The name of the result set column. The name of the result set is available for columns of all data types except for arrays.

nested_items.name: RowColumnInfo
nested_items.description: Indicates if the column is a row.

nested_items.name: Name
nested_items.description: The name of the result set column. The name of the result set is available for columns of all data types except for arrays.
